name: Goblin Scout
description: A sneaky goblin with sharp eyes and sharper teeth.

name: Gnoll Grunt
description: A savage hyena-like warrior.

name: Wolves
description: A hungry pack that strikes together.

name: Feral Dog
description: Snarling, fast, and vicious.

name: Lurking Thief
description: Steals more than your gold.

name: Shadow Rat
description: Moves quickly through the darkness.

name: Moss Golem
description: Slow, moss-covered, and stubborn.

name: Bandit Thug
description: Common road scum with a blade.

name: Lizardkin Scout
description: A nimble fighter from the marshlands.

name: Hobgoblin
description: Larger and more organized than goblins.

name: Cave Bat
description: Small and fast, with a high-pitched screech.

name: Forest Spider
description: Camouflaged in the trees, waiting to pounce.

name: Torch Bug
description: Explodes in a flash when cornered.

name: Venom Spider
description: Its bite weakens even the strongest.

name: Corrupted Sylvana
description: Once a guardian spirit of the forest, now a vengeful wraith of thorns and decay.

name: Slime
description: Sticky and acidic, but mostly annoying.

name: Swamp Rat
description: Carries more disease than danger.

name: Bone Crawler
description: Creeps across walls and ceilings.

name: Dire Wolf
description: Twice the size of a normal wolf.

name: Skeleton
description: A rattling pile of bones with a rusty sword.

name: Ghoul
description: Feasts on the flesh of the dead—and the living.

name: Wight
description: Unliving and full of hatred.

name: Tomb Guardian
description: Bound to protect ancient treasures.

name: Bog Hag
description: Casts curses and summons swamp beasts.

name: Stormbound General
description: A ghostly warrior with a blade of frost.

name: Zombie
description: Slow, dumb, but hard to put down.

name: Grave Robber
description: Uses trickery and speed to survive.

name: Bandit Leader
description: Leads with brutality and greed.

name: Troll Spawn
description: Tough-skinned and regenerating slowly.

name: Stone Golem
description: Nearly immovable and incredibly strong.

name: Heretic Prince
description: Channels forbidden magics to drain life.

name: Imp
description: A mischievous firestarter from the underworld.

name: Dust Wraith
description: Barely corporeal, but still deadly.

name: Carrion Drake
description: A scavenger dragon with acidic spit.

name: Flame Wisp
description: A sentient ball of fire and fury.

name: Dark Acolyte
description: Channels forbidden magics to drain life.

name: Minotaur
description: A brutal beast with a charging attack.

name: Nightmare Steed
description: Tramples foes under a burning mane.

name: Blade Dancer
description: Fast, precise, and deadly in duels.

name: Voidcaller
description: Summons horrors from beyond the veil.

name: Abyssal Spawn
description: Born of the void, and hungers for life.

name: Obsidian Knight
description: His oath unbroken. His soul bound. He will not let anyone past.

name: Necromancer
description: Raises allies from fallen enemies.

name: Flame Elemental
description: Its touch ignites all it strikes.

name: Dracolich
description: An undead dragon with arcane powers.

name: Lich
description: A master of death magic, nearly immortal.

name: Storm Revenant
description: Commands the skies with thunder.

name: Fire Troll
description: Immune to pain, and stronger in fire.

name: Phoenix Warden
description: Revives once per battle in a blaze.

name: Bone Colossus
description: A giant made of hundreds of corpses.

name: Blood Queen
description: Strikes from the shadows with deadly precision.

name: Chronarch
description: A being of glass and starlight.

name: Abyssal Crawler
description: A nightmarish creature with glistening limbs and a hunger for warm blood.

name: Onyx Gargantuan
description: A towering golem formed from compressed stone and fossilized remains.

name: Void Tunneler
description: Burrows through rock and reality alike.

name: Fungal Colossus
description: A living cave of spores and decay.

name: Stone Maw Basilisk
description: With eyes that turn flesh to stone.

name: Runebound Construct
description: Powered by lost magical inscriptions.

name: Balgrim the Vile
description: A demon warlord with an endless thirst for blood.

name: Zarael the Flameborn
description: A legendary phoenix demon, reborn from ash.

name: Thornshade the Eternal
description: A druidic horror who commands the forest itself.

name: Korthax the Unchained
description: A titan once sealed in ancient times.

name: Xal’Zaroth
description: A shadow demon who devours hope and light.

name: Ironfang the Betrayer
description: Once a noble knight, now a cursed blade wielder.

name: Maelgrin Doomcaller
description: A warlock who ended kingdoms.

name: Ashurak the Wrathful
description: His roar levels cities.

name: Velmora the Cruel
description: Queen of blades and blood.

name: The Lich King
description: His legend silences even the bravest.
